name: Abyssal Rescue
description:
Abyssal Rescue

Abyssal Rescue is an underwater adventure game where you play as a brave little fish who must save a giant whale from a ruthless futuristic civilization. Dive into the depths of the ocean and explore the mysteries of the abyss to complete your mission.

Controls

[wasd]/[zqsd] Move

[Left click] Interact

[F11] Toggle full screen

Tools
  • Engine: Godot 4.0
  • 3D: Blender
  • 2D: inkscape, Gimp

made for Potat0sJam#12
